description: Try our easy to follow Kale Pasta Carbonara recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Carbonara,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Kale,Peanut free
name: Kale Pasta Carbonara Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup parmesan, grated (save half for later)
0.5 bunch kale, stalks removed, leaves finely shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil. Meanwhile, whisk eggs, cream and parmesan together in a bowl and season with chilli or pepper.
Cook bacon and onion in a frying pan over medium heat for 5 minutes or until bacon is crisp and onion has softened. Add kale and cook, stirring continuously, until softened. Remove from heat.

Add pasta to boiling water and cook, following packet directions, until al dente. Drain well, return to pan and place over low heat. Add egg mixture. Toss well to coat pasta and cook until sauce thickens. Toss in kale mixture. Top with grated parmesan and parsley. Serve.
